values: Gain What You Cannot Lose: The Joy of World Mission with JesusGain What You Cannot Lose: The Joy of World Mission with Jesus

When Christ calls us to the mission field with him, he calls us to deny shallow pleasures, die to ourselves, and enjoy greater and greater delight in him.When Christ calls us to the mission field with him, he calls us to deny shallow pleasures, die to ourselves, and enjoy greater and greater delight in him.
